title: axios封装
content:
javascript
import Axios from 'axios';

import { BASE_URL } from '@/services';
import { updateToken } from '@/services/login';

import { antdUtils } from './antd';

interface IRequestQueue {
  // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any
  resolve: any;
  // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any
  config: any;
  type: 'request' | 'response';
}

const request = Axios.create({
  baseURL: BASE_URL,
  timeout: 5000,
});

const refreshTokenUrl = '';
let refreshTokenFlag = false;
const requestQueue: IRequestQueue[] = [];
let requestingCount = 0;
const limit = 3;

request.interceptors.request.use((config) => {
  if ([refreshTokenUrl].includes(config.url || '')) {
    return Promise.resolve(config);
  }

  if (refreshTokenFlag || requestingCount >= limit) {
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      requestQueue.push({
        resolve,
        config: config,
        type: 'request',
      });
    });
  }

  requestingCount += 1;

  const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
  if (token) {
    config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
  }
  return config;
});

request.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => {
    if (response.config.url !== refreshTokenUrl) {
      requestingCount -= 1;
      if (requestQueue.length) {
        requestByQueue();
      }
    }

    const data = response.data;

    if (response.status === 200) {
      if (data.status === 20003) {
        return new Promise((resolve) => {
          requestQueue.unshift({
            resolve,
            config: response.config,
            type: 'response',
          });
          if (refreshTokenFlag) return;
          refreshToken();
        });
      } else {
        return data;
      }
    }
    return Promise.reject(new Error(response.statusText || 'Error'));
  },
  (error) => {
    requestingCount -= 1;

    console.log('err:', error, error.response);
    if (error.response && error.response.status) {
      switch (error.response.status) {
        // 401: 未登录
        // 未登录则跳转登录页面，并携带当前页面的路径
        // 在登录成功后返回当前页面，这一步需要在登录页操作。
        case 401:
          window.location.hash = '#/login';
          break;
        // 403 token过期
        // 登录过期对用户进行提示
        // 清除本地token和清空vuex中token对象
        // 跳转登录页面
        case 403:
          window.location.hash = '#/login';
          break;
        // 404请求不存在
        case 404:
          antdUtils.notification?.error({
            message: `请求不存在`,
            description: error.response.data?.info || 'Error',
            duration: 1.5,
          });
          break;
        case 400:
          antdUtils.notification?.error({
            message: `请求参数有误`,
            description: error.response.data?.info || 'Error',
            duration: 1.5,
          });
          break;
        case 503:
          antdUtils.notification?.error({
            message: `服务器开小差了`,
            description: error.response.data || 'Error',
            duration: 1.5,
          });
          break;
        case 409:
          antdUtils.notification?.error({
            message: `名称重复`,
            description: '请更换为可用名称',
            duration: 1.5,
          });
          break;
        default:
          antdUtils.notification?.error({
            message: `请求错误`,
            description: error.response.data?.info || 'Error',
            duration: 1.5,
          });
      }
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

function requestByQueue() {
  if (!requestQueue.length) return;

  Array.from({ length: limit - requestingCount }).forEach(async () => {
    const record = requestQueue.shift();
    if (!record) {
      return;
    }

    const { config, resolve, type } = record;
    if (type === 'response') {
      resolve(await request(config));
    } else if (type === 'request') {
      requestingCount += 1;
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
      resolve(config);
    }
  });
}

async function refreshToken() {
  refreshTokenFlag = true;
  const userStatus = localStorage.getItem('userStatus');
  const refreshToken = localStorage.getItem('refreshToken');

  if (!refreshToken || userStatus !== 'login') window.location.hash = '#/login';

  const res = await updateToken(refreshToken as string);

  if (res.data.status === 20004) window.location.hash = '#/login';

  const { token, refreshToken: newRefreshToken } = res.data;
  localStorage.setItem('refreshToken', newRefreshToken);
  localStorage.setItem('token', token);

  refreshTokenFlag = false;

  requestByQueue();
}

export default request;
